radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Contrast-enhanced computed tomography (CT) of the abdomen and pelvis
Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the spine with contrast medium

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal, with no evidence of a demyelinating condition or abnormal enhancement
Patchy signal abnormality involving the cord parenchyma, primarily posterior in location, extending from approximately the C3 level down to the C6 and C7 levels.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial MRI scan did not reveal any evidence of the paratracheal mass.
